					}
				}

					popup = no
					round_the_clock_support = 1
				}
			}
		}

			limit = {
				NOT = {

				NOT = {

					is_researching_technology = trench_warfare
					is_researching_technology = mass_assault

				limit = {
					PREV = {
						has_tech = superior_firepower
					}
				}
				set_technology = {
					popup = no
					superior_firepower = 1
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {

						}

							name = land_doc_bonus
							bonus = 3
							uses = 1
							category = land_doctrine
						}
						else = {
							set_technology = {
								popup = no
								human_infantry_offensive = 1
							}
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						PREV = {
							has_tech = large_front_offensive
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							PREV = {
								is_ai = yes
							}
							OR = {
								original_tag = NLR
								original_tag = OLE
							}
						}
						add_tech_bonus = {
							name = land_doc_bonus
							bonus = 3
							uses = 1
							category = land_doctrine
						}

						OR = {
							original_tag = NLR
							original_tag = OLE
						}
					}
					add_tech_bonus = {
						name = naval_doc_bonus
						bonus = 3
						uses = 1
						category = naval_doctrine
					}
					else = {
						set_technology = {
							popup = no
							wolfpacks = 1
						}
					}
				}
			}

				}

					limit = {
						PREV = {
							has_tech = tech_unicorn_th
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								original_tag = NLR
								original_tag = NMS
							}
						}
						set_technology = {
							popup = no
							tech_unicorn_ms = 1
						}
						else = {
							set_technology = {
								popup = no
								tech_unicorn_th = 1
							}
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						PREV = {

					}
				}
				set_technology = {
				popup = no
					engine_tech_5 = 1
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					PREV = {
						has_tech = engine_tech_6
					}
				}
				set_technology = {
				popup = no
					engine_tech_6 = 1
				}
			}
		}
		fix_weapon_techs = yes
	}
}
